Episodes.Title: Do I Know You?
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Stella get engaged, but Ted soon learns that he doesn't know anything about her. Meanwhile, Barney confesses to Lily that he's in love with Robin

Episodes.Title: The Best Burger in New York
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall claims that he had the best hamburger in the world during his first week in New York City, but he forgot where the burger joint is located. The gang then hits the streets of Manhattan to help him find it.

Episodes.Title: I Heart NJ
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Greg Malins
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted does not want to move in with Stella because he hates New Jersey. Robin prematurely quits her TV job because she incorrectly thinks that she already has a new job.

Episodes.Title: Intervention
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted, Robin, Marshall, and Lily all begin getting cold feet because of their imminent life changes, and Barney tries to prove that he can pick up a woman while posing as an 80-year-old man.

Episodes.Title: Shelter Island
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Stella move up their wedding date, but the wedding may not go off as planned after Ted breaks the "No Exes Rule" and invites Robin to come in from Japan for the wedding.

Episodes.Title: Happily Ever After
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The gang tries to hide from Stella when they discover that they are eating at the same restaurant.

Episodes.Title: Not a Father's Day
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Barney celebrates a pregnancy false alarm, Marshall and Lily try to figure out if it's time to have a baby.

Episodes.Title: Woooo!
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Lily is disappointed to discover that Robin is secretly a "Woooo! Girl," and Barney secretly sabotages Ted's chance to get the contract to design a new bank skyscraper.

Episodes.Title: The Naked Man
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When the gang learns that a bold, desperation date move got Robin into bed, Ted and Barney decide to try it out for themselves.

Episodes.Title: The Fight
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Theresa Mulligan
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The guys get invited to fight alongside Doug the Bartender. However, the fight doesn't go exactly how they imagined it to.

Episodes.Title: Little Minnesota
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chuck Tatham
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted tries to keep his irresponsible sister from hooking up with Barney during her trip to New York, and Robin starts hanging out with Marshall at a bar for Minnesotans, not telling them that she's really Canadian.

Episodes.Title: Benefits
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Robin discover that sex with each other solve their fights as roommates, which makes Barney very jealous and angry. Meanwhile, Marshall reveals that he's too embarrassed to use the office bathroom.

Episodes.Title: Three Days of Snow
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Matt Kuhn
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Barney get an opportunity to run their own bar during a historic blizzard, while Marshall and Lily try to defy the odds and continue one of their cherished traditions.

Episodes.Title: The Possimpible
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jonathan Groff
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Robin needs to find a television job in seven days or else she loses her work visa, and Barney volunteers to come to her aid. Meanwhile, Ted, Marshall, and Lily consider cleaning up their resumes

Episodes.Title: The Stinsons
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The guys find out that Barney is pretending to have a wife and son to make his mother happy, but the charade is blown when Ted makes a move on Barney's "wife."

Episodes.Title: Sorry, Bro
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted meets with his ex-girlfriend from college--a girlfriend who cheated on him constantly and Marshall and Lily can't stand, and Marshall tells the story about how he forgot to bring his pants to work.

Episodes.Title: The Front Porch
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted becomes angry with Lily when he finds out that she has been sabotaging all his relationships that she did not approve of, including his relationship with Robin.

Episodes.Title: Old King Clancy
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney and Marshall don't tell Ted that the plans for the building he has been working on have been scrapped, and the guys try to figure out which Canadian celebrity Robin slept with.

Episodes.Title: Murtaugh
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney tries to do all the items on Ted's "I'm too old for this stuff" list while Marshall's over-competitive side comes out when he coaches Lily's kindergarten basketball team.

Episodes.Title: Mosbius Designs
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted's plans to make his own design firm in his apartment hit a snag when his personal assistant begins sleeping with Robin, and Marshall tries to find a way to make himself indispensable at his workplace.

Episodes.Title: The Three Days Rule
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Greg Malins
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted gets around the three-day rule by texting a woman he just met, but he doesn't realize that he's actually texting Barney and Marshall.

Episodes.Title: Right Place Right Time
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted recounts the series of random events that lead up to the chance meeting with the woman who would eventually become his wife.

Episodes.Title: As Fast as She Can
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Stella's boyfriend Tony breaks up with her after having a conversation with Ted, prompting Stella to come back to Ted with a surprising request.

Episodes.Title: The Leap
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Ted struggles with an unorthodox architecture project, Robin finds out that Barney is in love with her, and Marshall threatens to take a long-considered leap from the roof to a neighboring building.
